trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control redistributes space between rows or between columns.
trans-unit.target: 지정 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> 컨트롤을 다시 맞추는 열 또는 행 간에 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this enumeration to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control.
trans-unit.target: 이 열거형을 사용 하 여 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>속성의는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: Space is redistributed based on the values of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment*>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment*>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth*>, and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight*> properties of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값에 따라 공간이 배분 됩니다는 <> </> *>, <> </> *>, <> </> *>, 및 <> </> *>의 속성은 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>, space is redistributed between columns.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>로 설정 되지 않은 <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>, 열 사이 공간이 배분 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch> and the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>, space is redistributed between rows.
trans-unit.target: If는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>로 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>및 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>로 설정 되지 않은 <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>, 행 사이 공간이 배분 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the following conditions are true, space is redistributed between columns: - The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>.
trans-unit.target: -다음 조건이 true 인 경우 열 사이 공간이 배분 됩니다:- <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>를 <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>.</xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> is less than or equal to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>.

- If the following conditions are true, space is redistributed between rows: - <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>.
trans-unit.target: -다음 조건이 true 인 경우 행 사이 공간이 배분 됩니다:- <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>를 <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>.</xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>
